item.title: GitHub Actions for Data Scientists
item.description: Automate tasks using GitHub Actions: Test code Build docs Scrape data from websites Build LaTeX resume Demos here: https://github.com/emptymalei/github-actions-for-data-scientists Use the following timezone tool or click on the “Add to Calendar” button on the sidebar. Click here for an interactive widget.
